name: Trash Atlantis
description:
A humorous marine clicker that raises issues of ecology and self-destruction. The player builds a city, but his merits will go to one of the sea tyrants.

System requirements - carefully honed mouse cursor.

The authors:

  • Luxorix - idea, code, game design
  • Klimach - idea, art, animation
  • Nikiprotiv - idea, narrative, editing
  • Kosta - idea, game design, code
  • Brutal Pony Riders - music
